content: कर्णिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Having ears. {@--2@} Having a helm. --कः A steersman. --का {@--1@} An ear-ring. {@--2@} A knot, round protuberance. {@--3@} Pericarp of a lotus. {@--4@} A small brush or pen. {@--5@} The middle finger. {@--6@} A fruit-stalk. {@--7@} The tip of an elephant's trunk. {@--8@} Chalk. {@--9@} A trowel. {@--10@} A bawd.
